definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: seldom of things [[בִּלְבַב יַמִּים]] in the Midst of the seas Jon 2:3 (poetry); [[עד לבב השׁמים]] unto the midst of heaven De 4:11 (so Sam but MT [[לב]]).

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: usu. of men:

the inner man in contrast with the outer, [[כלה שׁארי ולבבי]] my flesh and my heart (soul) doth fail Ps 73:26; antithesis with garments Joe 2:13; hands Ps 73:13, La 3:41 ?; eyes Nu 15:39 (H) 1Sa 16:7; ears Ez Eze 3:10; mouth De 30:14; speech Ps 28:3, Ps 78:18; [[מְתׂפֲפׂת עַל־לִבְבֵהֶן]] tabering upon their breasts Na 2:7 (inner for outer).

the inner man, indef. the soul, comprehending mind, affections and will, or, in connexion with certain verbs, having more specific reference to some one of them. [[בכל־לבב ובכל־נפשׁ]] with all the heart and with all the soul De 4:29, De 6:5, De 10:12, De 11:13, De 13:4, De 26:16, De 30:2, De 30:6, De 30:10, Jos 22:5, Jos 23:14, 1Ki 2:4, 1Ki 8:48, (= 2Ch 6:38 [[לב]] ?) 2Ki 23:25, 2Ch 15:12, 2Ch 34:31 ( = 2Ki 23:3 [[לב]] ?) Je 32:41; abbr. [[בכל־לבב]] 1Sa 7:3, 1Sa 12:20, 1Sa 12:24, 1Ki 14:8, 2Ki 10:31, 2Ch 15:5, 2Ch 22:9, 2Ch 31:21, Ps 86:12, Ps 111:1, Je 29:13, Joe 2:12; [[אשׁר בלבב]] what is in the heart (mind) De 8:2, 1Sa 9:19, 1Sa 14:7, 2Sa 7:3 ( = 1Ch 17:2) 2Ki 10:30; 2Ch 32:31; cf. Job 10:13, Ps 84:6 (?); [[עם לבב]] with the heart (mind), c. [[ידע]] De 8:5, [[שִׂיחַ]] Ps 77:7, usu. c. [[היה]], of a thought or purpose, De 15:9, Jos 14:7, 1Ki 8:17, 1Ki 8:18, 1Ki 8:18 ( = 2Ch 6:7; 2Ch 6:8; 2Ch 6:8) 1Ki 10:2 ( = 2Ch 9:1) 1Ch 22:7, 1Ch 28:2, 2Ch 1:11, 2Ch 29:10 (cf. 2Ch 24:4 [[לב]]); [[כלבב]] according to the heart 1Sa 13:14, 1Sa 14:7, Ps 20:7. We may add De 5:26, De 11:16, De 11:18, De 17:17, 1Sa 2:35, 2Sa 19:15, 1Ki 8:39, 1Ki 8:39 ( = 2Ch 6:30; 2Ch 6:30) 1Ki 11:2, 1Ki 11:3 ([[לב]] an error) v:1Ki 11:4, v:1Ki 11:9, 1Ch 12:17, 1Ch 22:19, 1Ch 28:9, Ps 62:9, Ps 86:11, Ps 139:23, Is 7:2, Da 11:27; Da 11:28.
specific ref. to mind (characteristic of [[לבב]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אַנְשֵׁי לֵבָב]] men of mind Job 34:10; Job 34:34; [[גם לי לבב]] I also have a mind Job 12:3; ´[[הוֹלֵלוֹת בִּל]] madness is in (their) mind Ec 9:3 (?); [[וַתִּגְנׁב לְבָבִי]] and thou didst steal my mind Ge 31:26 (E, the [[לֵב]] of v:Ge 31:20 should be corrected to [[לבב]] cf. ‘steal me’ v:Ge 31:27).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: knowledge, c.  [[ידע]] De 8:5, De 23:14, 1Ki 2:44; [[הבין]] Is 6:10, Is 32:4; [[חֲכַם לֵבָב]] wise of mind Job 9:4; [[לְבַב חָכְמָה]] mind of wisdom Ps 90:12.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: thinking, reflection, c. [[חשׁב]] Is 10:7, Zec 7:10, Zec 8:17; ([[שׂיּח]] Ps 77:7 supr.); ´[[יחר מחשׁבות ל]] conception of thoughts of mind 1Ch 29:18; ´[[מַשְׂכִּיּוֹת ל]] imaginations of (their) mind Ps 73:7; ´[[מוֹרָשֵׁי ל]] possessions (thoughts) of (my) mind Job 17:11; [[שׂם לבב]] set the mind, consider Hag 2:15, Hag 2:18, Hag 2:18, c. [[לְ]] De 32:46, [[על]] Hag 1:5, Hag 1:7.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of memeory [[שׂס בלבב]] lay up in the mind 1Sa 21:13, Job 22:22; ´[[השׁיב אל ל]] lay to heart, call to mind De 4:39, De 30:1, 2Ch 6:37 ( = 1Ki 8:47 [[לב]] ?); ´[[עלה על ל]] come upon the mind Je 51:50, Ez Eze 38:10 (cf. [[לֵב]]

definitions.body: ); ´[[סוּר מל]] depart from the mind De 4:9; ´[[שׁמר בתוך ל]] keep in the midst of (thy) mind Pr 4:21; ´[[על ל]] upon the mind De 6:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: it is the seat of naughtiness 1Sa 17:28 (?), erring Ps 95:10; is forward Ps 101:4.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: seat of pride, Ps 101:5, Is 9:8, Is 10:12, Is 60:5 (?) Ez Eze 28:5, Eze 28:6 (?) Da 8:25; ´[[רָם ל]] heart is lifted up De 8:14, De 17:20, Ez Eze 31:10, Da 11:12.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: is circumcised De 10:16, De 30:6, Je 4:4, or uncircumcised Le 26:41 (H); is hardened ´[[אמּץ ל]] De 2:30, De 15:7, 2Ch 36:13; ´[[כבּד ל]] 1Sa 6:6 (?); ´[[הקשׁה ל]] Ps 95:8.

= the man himself (meaning characteristic of [[נֶפֶשׁ]]) ´[[אמר בל]] say in the heart (to oneself) De 7:17, De 8:17, De 9:4, De 18:21, Ps 4:5, Is 14:3, Is 47:8, Is 49:21, Je 5:24, Je 13:22, Zep 1:12, Zep 2:15; [[ללבב]] Ho 7:2 (?); ´[[דבר בל]] Ps 15:2; ´[[ברכו בל]] Job 1:5; ´[[התברך בל]] De 29:18; [[יְחִי לְבַבְכֶם]] let your heart (you yourselves) live Ps 22:27, Ps 69:33 (cf. Ps 119:175).

spec. as the seat of the appetites (for which usually [[נֶפֶשׁ]]) ´[[סעד ל]] stay the heart (with food) Ps 104:15, Ju Jdg 19:8 (?); [[יִיטַב לְבָבְֶָ]] that thine heart may be merry (with wine) Ju Jdg 19:9 (?); [[יַיִן]] ´[[יְשַׂמַּח ל]] wine gladdens the heart Ps 104:15.
spec. of seat of the emotions and passions (for which usually [[נפשׁ]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of joy Is 30:29, Je 15:16, Ez Eze 36:5, gladness De 28:47, desire Pr 6:25 (?); [[דבּר]] ´[[על ל]] speak into the heart (comfortably) 2Ch 32:6 (elsewhere [[לֵב]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of trouble 1Ki 8:38, Ps 25:17, Ps 73:21; weakness, faintness Le 26:36 (H) De 20:3, De 20:18, 2Ch 13:7, Is 1:5, Is 7:4, Je 51:46, grief De 15:10, 1Sa 1:8 sorrow Ps 13:3, fear De 28:67, dismay Is 21:4, astonishment De 28:28, anger De 19:6, hate Le 19:16 (H); ´[[ימּם ל]] the heart melteth De 20:8, Jos 2:11, Jos 5:1, Jos 7:5 (all D) Is 13:7, Is 19:1; ´[[המם ל]] De 1:28 (so rd. prob. also Jos 14:8, where [[לֵב]] error).
seat of courage (for which usually [[רוּחַ]]), [[יָעֵר כּׂחוֹ]] [[וּלְבָבוֹ]] stir up his power and his courage Da 11:25; [[יַאֲמֵץ לְבַבְכֶם]] let your heart take courage Ps 31:25.
